about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I am a Web Developer with experience as a Customer Support Agent. I have outstanding skills in Front-End, Back-End, and relational databases.

My training and experience have allowed me to develop solid communication and problem-solving skills. I am focused on creating efficient and functional solutions that improve the user experience and optimize processes.
I look for opportunities to apply my technical knowledge and contribute to the success of innovative projects.

hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: Crafting modern web experiences with React, Next.js, and TypeScript

items.title: Static Websites
items.description: Fast, responsive, and SEO-friendly static websites built with modern technologies.

items.title: Web Applications
items.description: Full-stack web applications with robust backend integration and user authentication.

items.title: Customer Support Agent
items.description: Proficient in bilingual communication, providing exceptional customer service with tools like Zendesk.
